pitch.cc: Dangerous count for Francisco Liriano; Mike Moustakas is a dead-red fastball hitter, with a 1.028 OPS against them this season and .864 against everything else.
Francisco Liriano is trying to tie up Mike Moustakas with fastballs inside; Moustakas is hitting .235 on pitches in that location compared to .279 overall.
